color: silver, blue, red, purple, white, pink, or black
preset_modes: more  than 25 exposure modes (e.g. low light, beach, backlighting)
effects: 11 artistic effect modes (big eyes, skin softening, miniature, etc.)
24 creative mode settings (vivid, sepia, skin softening, etc.)
ISO: up to 3200 ISO with little noise
long_exposure: 30 seconds max, with bulb mode expose as long as you want
